title: Inhalable drug-loaded silk fibroin carriers for pulmonary drug delivery
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,27288-27297
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03324H, Paper
Open Access

Ilenia D'Onofrio, Giuseppe De Giorgio, Roman Sajapin, Davide Vurro, Aris Liboà, Elena Dembech, Giovanna Trevisi, Maddalena Botti, Vardan Galstyan, Giuseppe Tarabella, Pasquale D'Angelo
The design and development of SF-based engineered micro and nano-carriers, with potential enhanced therapeutic performance over traditional delivery methods, could be essential for pharmaceutical research.
